players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's all be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Bob: "Let's work together to uncover any mafia among us. I'll support whoever the detective points out."
Bob: "I will continue to cooperate with Charlie and Alice. Let's all stay vigilant and work together to identify the mafia."

You: "I think it's important that we all communicate openly and honestly to help identify the mafia among us. Let's share any suspicions or concerns we have, but let's also try to avoid making accusations without solid evidence."

Charlie: "I believe that open communication and cooperation are key to identifying the mafia among us. Let's continue to share any suspicions or concerns we have, but let's also make sure we have solid evidence before making accusations."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's all be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
You: "Let's work together to uncover any mafia among us. I'll support whoever the detective points out."
You: "I will continue to cooperate with Charlie and Alice. Let's all stay vigilant and work together to identify the mafia."

Alice: "I think it's important that we all communicate openly and honestly to help identify the mafia among us. Let's share any suspicions or concerns we have, but let's also try to avoid making accusations without solid evidence."

Charlie: "I believe that open communication and cooperation are key to identifying the mafia among us. Let's continue to share any suspicions or concerns we have, but let's also make sure we have solid evidence before making accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "I will continue to cooperate with Charlie and Alice. Let's all stay vigilant and work together to identify the mafia."

Alice: "I think it's important that we all communicate openly and honestly to help identify the mafia among us. Let's share any suspicions or concerns we have, but let's also try to avoid making accusations without solid evidence."
